profile:
We are proudly based in the beautiful town of Coboconk, Ontario. At Driftwood Mechanical Ltd, our clients are our number one priority, we go the extra mile to make sure theyâ€™re completely satisfied. We strive to provide reliable, quality workmanship and unmatched customer service. Let us add you to our list of 100% satisfied customers.

To always suggest to you the best suited equipment for your project. We provide our customers multiple options for every budget. All jobs are completed with top quality workmanship. We are on time and on budget. Staff ensure all products have the best warranty and true professional service. We are always available if you have questions or concerns, Our Staff is always happy to make a return trip to make sure you are 100% Satisfied!
